info.title: Asset and Work Management API
info.description: REST API for Asset and Work Management

post.description: Returns CU Business Object and CU attributes information.

example1.description: To retrieve business object dataset for a give CU name.

example2.description: To retrieve business object dataset for the give CU name, additionally retrieve columns listed in comparison_filter and apply filter listed in attribute_filter.

example3.description: To retrieve business object data for given CU, also retrieve data for the facet datasets listed in comparison_filter.

example4.description: To retrieve business object data, also retrieve facet dataset data. Apply filter on facet dataset.

example5.description: To retrieve business object data, also retrieve all the facet dataset data.

post.x-amazon-apigateway-request-validator: Validate query string parameters and headers

post.description: This endpoint retrieves data from equipment_compatible_unit dataset based on the request body of the post request.

select.description: Optional parameter to list fields that need to be retrieved from dataset. If not specified then it returns all BO related fields which are listed in default property. If 'ALL' is specified then it retrieves all fields in the dataset

key_filter.description: Required parameter to filter out data from the dataset based on key or gsi.

attribute_filter.description: Optional parameter to filter out data from the dataset based on non key or non gsi.

next_token.description: Optional parameter to pass next token and request the next set of responses

example1.description: In this example we are passing list of fields in the optional select property to return back in response. In the filter property we are passing the primary key (cu_nm) conditions to return data in response.

example2.description: In this example we are skipping the optional select property to return only default columns in response. In the filter property we are passing the gsi columns (status_desc and cu_desc) conditions to return data in response.

value: REM ONLY-Fuse Cutout 100A 35kV porcelain for use with equipment

example3.description: In this example we are skipping the optional select property to return only default columns in response. In the key filter property we are passing the gsi columns (status_desc and cu_nm) and in attribute filter non gsi conditions to return data in response. We are also providing additional filter based on non key or gsi columns.

post.x-amazon-apigateway-request-validator: Validate query string parameters and headers

post.description: This endpoint retrieves data from equipment_compatible_unit_detail dataset based on the request body of the post request.

select.description: Optional parameter to list fields that need to be retrieved from dataset. If not specified then it returns all BO related fields which are listed in default property. If 'ALL' is specified then it retrieves all fields in the dataset

key_filter.description: Required parameter to filter out data from the dataset based on keys and gsi.

attribute_filter.description: Optional parameter to filter out data from the dataset based on non keys and non gsi.

example1.description: In this example we are passing list of fields in the optional select property to return back in response. In the filter property we are passing the primary key and secondary key (child_cu_nm and cu_dtl_key) conditions to return data in response.

example2.description: In this example we are passing ALL in the optional select property to return back all columns in this dataset including the default columns in response. In the filter property we are passing the gsi columns (parent_cu_nm and cu_dtl_key) conditions to return data in response.

example3.description: In this example we are skipping the optional select property to return only default columns in response. In the key filter property we are passing the primary key and secondary key (child_cu_nm and cu_dtl_key) conditions to return data in response. We are also providing additional filter based on non key or gsi columns.

key_filter.description: Required parameter to filter out data from the dataset based on keys and gsi.

example1.description: In this example we are passing list of fields in the optional select property to return back in response. In the filter property we are passing the primary key (site_id) conditions to return data in response.

example2.description: In this example we are passing ALL in the optional select property to return back all columns in this dataset including the default columns in response. In the filter property we are passing the primary key (site_id) conditions to return data in response. We are also providing additional filter based on other columns.

example3.description: In this example we are skipping the optional select property to return only default columns in response. In the filter property we are passing the primary key (site_id) conditions to return data in response.

post.description: This endpoint retrieves data from long_description dataset based on the request body of the post request.

select.description: Optional parameter to list fields that need to be retrieved from dataset. If not specified then it returns all BO related fields which are listed in default property. If 'ALL' is specified then it retrieves all fields in the dataset

key_filter.description: Required parameter to filter out data from the dataset based on keys and gsi.

example1.description: In this example we are passing list of fields in the optional select property to return back in response. In the filter property we are passing the primary key (trans_table) and sort key (trans_column and trans_key) conditions to return data in response.

example2.description: In this example we are passing ALL in the optional select property to return back all columns in this dataset including the default columns in response. In the filter property we are passing the primary key (trans_table) and sort key (trans_column and trans_key) conditions to return data in response. We are also providing additional filter based on other columns.

example3.description: In this example we are skipping the optional select property to return only default columns in response. In the filter property we are passing the primary key (trans_table) and sort key (trans_column and trans_key) conditions to return data in response.

post.description: This endpoint retrieves data from equipment_asset dataset based on the request body of the post request.

select.description: Optional parameter to list fields that need to be retrieved from dataset. If not specified then it returns all BO related fields which are listed in default property. If 'ALL' is specified then it retrieves all fields in the dataset

key_filter.description: Required parameter to filter out data from the dataset based on keys and gsi.

attribute_filter.description: Optional parameter to filter out data from the dataset based on non keys and non gsi.

example1.description: In this example we are passing list of fields in the optional select property to return back in response. In the filter property we are passing the pk (asset_num) and sk (site_id) conditions to return data in response.

example2.description: In this example we are passing ALL in the optional select property to return back all columns in this dataset including the default columns in response. In the filter property we are passing the pk (asset_num) and sk (site_id) conditions to return data in response.

example3.description: In this example we are skipping the optional select property to return only default columns in response. In the filter property we are passing the the pk (asset_num) and sk (site_id) conditions to return data in response.

post.description: This endpoint retrieves data from equipment_asset_attribute dataset based on the request body of the post request.

select.description: Optional parameter to list fields that need to be retrieved from dataset. If not specified then it returns all BO related fields which are listed in default property. If 'ALL' is specified then it retrieves all fields in the dataset

key_filter.description: Required parameter to filter out data from the dataset based on keys and gsi.

attribute_filter.description: Optional parameter to filter out data from the dataset based on non keys and non gsi.

example1.description: In this example we are passing list of fields in the optional select property to return back in response. In the filter property we are passing the primary key and secondary key (attr_id and site_id) conditions to return data in response.

example2.description: In this example we are passing ALL in the optional select property to return back all columns in this dataset including the default columns in response. In the filter property we are passing the primary key and secondary key (attr_id and site_id) conditions to return data in response.

example3.description: In this example we are skipping the optional select property to return only default columns in response. In the filter property we are passing the primary key and secondary key (attr_id and site_id) and attribute filter (domain) conditions to return data in response.

post.x-amazon-apigateway-request-validator: Validate query string parameters and headers

key_filter.description: Required: Filter based on CUNAME, Description, Region Code, Status.

comparison_filter.description: Optional: Select dataset name and specific columns for the dataset.

ComparisonOperator.description: ComparisonOperator, EQ for '=', NEQ for '<>', GT for '>', GTE for '>=', LT for '<', LTE for '<=', In for 'IN', CONTAINS for (LIKE '%123%'), STARTSWITH for (LIKE '123%'), ENDSWITH for (LIKE '%123') ISNULL for 'IS NULL', ...

responseTemplates.application/json: {"message":"User is not authorized to perform this operation - missing authentication token"}
{"message":"Unauthorized. Either no access token was provided or it was invalid"}
{"message":"User is not authorized to perform this operation - expired token"}
{"message":"User is not authorized to perform this operation - invalid signature"}
{"message":"User is not authorized to perform this operation - invalid api key"}
{"message":"User is not authorized to perform this operation - WAF Filtered"}
